sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>fang</radical> on a <radical>building</radical> shows that it's <kanji>wicked</kanji>. Something wicked probably lives in the building too.
meaningInfo: Not like, wicked cool, but like wicked evil. I see you, New Englanders.
readingMnemonic: You peek inside the <kanji>wicked</kanji> building and a wicked <reading>ja</reading>guar (<ja>じゃ</ja>) suddenly pounces at you! You let out a sigh of relief when it's stopped by the window, but then... the window opens?! What a wicked building! It's letting the jaguar get you!
readingInfo: Imagine being chased around the outside of this wicked fanged building as the wicked fanged jaguar tries to eat you. Ahhh!
